programs.program_name: LLB (Hons) (3+0) with University of London International Programmes, UK

entry_requirements_raw.A-Level:
2 Passes.  CLP Requirements apply:
UK Law Degree - 3 credits in SPM/O-Level obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 3 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination
entry_requirements_raw.Diploma:
Minimum CGPA 2.50 (Diploma in a related field).  CLP Requirements apply:
UK Law Degree - 3 credits in SPM/O-Level obtained in one examination
Australia/NZ Law Degree - 3 credits in SPM/O-Level equivalent (Year 10) obtained in one examination
